title: Game bug???
body: So uhm, I started a game, loaded fine until I got ingame where there was no character in view. So I left and tried to reload again and it didn't work giving me bugsplats tons of times. I close and restart league of legends and then see no reconnect to the game so I try to join a new queue saying i'm already in-game. So I restart league of legends once again and reconnect then I get a bugsplat and after I try again and nothing happens??? please help. And will I get penalyzed for not being able to rejoin the game itself.. if they didn't remake.

replies.body: It seems that there is an issue with your computer rendering game files and causing it to crash.  I recommend going over our [Game Crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) guide to help troubleshoot this.  As a first step, I suggest updating your graphics driver and running a repair which can recover any files that may have become corrupt.  Please let me know if you have any questions!

If they did remake the game, then I have my reconnect tab always opening as a bug and I can't do anything help please.
and even when clicking reconnect I get a bugsplat constantly

I restarted and it prompted me to fix my client and I am currently doing that.

SAME  here first time ever been an issue and it has arisen since 6.14...got me a 5  game reduce que and lost me 2 ranked  games...thanks a lot  riot been playing this game since  end of season 2 and now im facing demotion back to silver 2 after being  gold 5 already...I find  this highly frustrating as I was trying to reconnect both times and just get a game file rendering error. B.S I lose over 35 Lp due to an issue on your  side. Btw have tried repairing data corruption 3 times now.  Stop the  SCRUTINY

That does sound frustrating and I'd like to help you get back in the game.  If the Game Crash guide doesn't resolve your issue, please reach out to our tech team for assistance by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  In preparation, please gather these set of logs in your ticket:

- [DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)
- [Your latest R3d Log (check the date!)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7)
- [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
